ygData.subject: Re: Interesting Benefit of Charismatic Carralion
ygData.msgSnippet: I went and visited the shady swashbuckler in the tunnel between east commons and north ro.  He is normally indifferent to me.  I checked his price on a couple
ygData.messageBody:
I went and visited the shady swashbuckler in the tunnel between east
commons and north ro. He is normally indifferent to me. I checked
his price on a couple of weapons then sung the charismatic song and
he became amiable to me. He still wanted the same amount of money
for those well balanced weapons though.

Tigsen
15th level half-dark-elf bard on Innoruuk

--- "Mott, Mike J." <MIKE.J.MOTT@...> wrote:
> From: "Mott, Mike J." <MIKE.J.MOTT@...>
>
> Not sure if this has been posted yet, but an interesting side
> benefit of the
> song is that you can now do quests with NPC's who would not talk to
> you
> before. This is possibly one of the biggest uses of the song
> besides
> selling items at better prices.
>
> Lago Bardoon of Bertox
>
>
